article_title: Employers Brace For Health Plan Mergers, Worry About Choice

article_metadata.description: As health insurance companies engage in unprecedented consolidation, their employer clients are somewhat concerned fewer insurers correlates into less choice for their employees. A survey of more than 100 large employers by benefits consultancy Aon Hewitt (AON) indicates 46% of companies “believe it will result in fewer health plan options for [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
